amendment.description: To use unspent COVID-19 relief funds to offset the costs of grants.

vote.text: Amendment SA 81, under the order of 4/18/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 49. Record Vote Number: 91.

action.text: Amendment SA 81 proposed by Senator Scott FL. (consideration: CR S1238-1239) To use unspent COVID-19 relief funds to offset the costs of grants.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 81 proposed by Senator Scott FL.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 81, under the order of 4/18/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 49. Record Vote Number: 91.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 81, under the order of 4/18/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 49. Record Vote Number: 91.
